mapper.sql: f_id, f_parent_id, f_url, f_name, f_method, f_operator_id, f_operator, f_create_time, f_update_time, f_logic_delete, f_version, f_note
mapper.select: select DISTINCT permission.* from faa_role_permission role_permission, faa_user_role user_role, faa_permission permission where user_role.f_user_id = #{id} and role_permission.f_role_id = user_role.f_role_id and permission.f_logic_delete = 0 and role_permission.f_logic_delete = 0 and user_role.f_logic_delete = 0

select DISTINCT permission.* from faa_role_permission role_permission, faa_permission permission where role_permission.f_role_id = #{id} and permission.f_id = role_permission.f_permission_id and permission.f_logic_delete = 0 and role_permission.f_logic_delete = 0

SELECT f_id, f_parent_id, f_url, f_name, f_method, f_operator_id, f_operator, f_create_time, f_update_time, f_logic_delete, f_version, f_note FROM `faa_permission` WHERE `f_logic_delete` = 0 AND `f_parent_id` = #{parentId}
